short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open up any site in a new popup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your current window into a popup window (aka modal). Increase your browser window's screen real estate by clicking on an icon. Each window is resizable, and its audio can be muted by pressing M. Note: As an alternative to clicking, Alt/Option+P will also work.
